1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'When anyone of you performs ablution and does it well, then he comes to the mosque for no other purpose than prayer, he does not take one step but Allah will raise him one degree (in status) thereby, and remove one sin from him thereby, until he enters the mosque
